ELPE.AT.summary: Hellenic Petroleum S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the energy sector primarily in Greece, South Eastern Europe, and the East Mediterranean. The company operates through the Refining, Marketing, Exploration and Production of Hydrocarbons, Petro-chemicals, Gas and Power, and Other segments. It engages in the supply, refining, and trading of petroleum products; marketing of fuels; production and trading of petrochemicals/chemicals; exploration and production of oil and gas; and generation and trading of power. It is also involved in the production, distribution, and trading of renewable energy sources; provision of financing and other financial services; retail trade of liquid fuels and LPG; operation of tankers; exploration and production of hydrocarbons; trade, distribution, and storage of oil products; operation of crude oil pipelines; owning of vessels; production and marketing of polypropylene, BOPP films, and solvents; trading of imported plastics and chemicals; and provision of treasury services. In addition, the company provides consulting and engineering services, as well as participates in the development of cross-border gas pipelines. Hellenic Petroleum S.A. operates a network of 1,738 service stations, 15 fuel storage and distribution facilities, 23 aircraft refueling stations in the Greek airports, 2 LPG bottling plants, and 1 lubricant production and packing site in Greece. Hellenic Petroleum S.A. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Maroussi, Greece.
